content.rendered: Description: 2.6m (8.5fts) foldable telescopic style climb ladder Foldable design, convenient to use and easy to carry around Great helper for both indoor household use and outdoor activities Safe and compact—-black anti-slip rubber sleeve on the bottom of ladder step Locking levels with locking mechanism Approved by European Safety Standard EN131 Specification: Number of Ladder Step: 9 Step Interval: 27.5cm/10.8inch G.W.: about 9.7kg Max. Load: 150kg

excerpt.rendered:
• 2.6m (8.5ft) foldable telescopic style climb ladder
  • Foldable design, convenient to use and easy to carry around
  • Approved? Safety Standard EN131
  • Locking levels with locking mechanism, Anti-pinch Function, Saftey Gap for Fingers
  • Safe and compact—-black anti-slip rubber sleeve on the bottom of ladder step
